signals: Join a community of millions of users globally
Company logos: Visa, Coinbase, John Deere, Zoom, Grand Hyatt and Fender

valueProps.text: Trello helps users stay organized and efficient with features like Inbox, Boards, and Planner.
Trello offers easy integrations and automation to enhance productivity.
Trello is chosen for its ease of use by 81% of customers.

pains: Clutter and chaos in task management
Difficulty in organizing and tracking tasks
Need for effective communication and collaboration tools
proof: 75% of organizations report that Trello delivers value within 30 days.
81% of customers chose Trello for its ease of use.
74% of customers say Trello has improved communication with their teams.

facts.text: Trello is a product of Atlassian.
facts.evidence: Accelerate your teams' work with Atlassian Intelligence (AI) features.

facts.text: Trello offers a free sign-up option.
Trello provides an Inbox feature to capture to-dos from anywhere.
facts.evidence: When it’s on your mind, it goes in your Inbox. Capture your to-dos from anywhere, anytime.

facts.text: Trello Boards help manage long to-do lists.
facts.evidence: Your to-do list may be long, but it can be manageable!

facts.text: Trello Planner allows users to drag and drop tasks into a calendar.
facts.evidence: Drag, drop, get it done. Snap your top tasks into your calendar.

facts.text: Trello can turn emails into to-dos using AI.
facts.evidence: Easily turn your emails into to-dos! Just forward them to your Trello Inbox.

facts.text: Trello integrates with Slack and Microsoft Teams.
facts.evidence: Need to follow up on a message from Slack or Microsoft Teams? Send it directly to your Trello board!

facts.text: Trello offers no-code automation on every board.
facts.evidence: No-code automation is built into every Trello board.

facts.text: Trello allows card mirroring across multiple boards.
facts.evidence: View all your to-dos from multiple boards in one place.

facts.text: Trello supports integrations with other apps.
facts.evidence: Connect the apps you are already using into your Trello workflow.

facts.text: Trello is used by companies like Visa, Coinbase, and Zoom.
facts.evidence: Company logos: Visa, Coinbase, John Deere, Zoom, Grand Hyatt and Fender

facts.text: Trello is described as simplifying complex processes.
facts.evidence: Trello is great for simplifying complex processes.

facts.text: Joey Rosenberg from Women Who Code endorses Trello.
facts.evidence: Joey Rosenberg, Global Leadership Director at Women Who Code

facts.text: 75% of organizations report value from Trello within 30 days.
facts.evidence: 75% of organizations report that Trello delivers value to their business within 30 days.

facts.text: Sumeet Moghe from ThoughtWorks endorses Trello.
facts.evidence: Sumeet Moghe, Product Manager at ThoughtWorks

facts.text: Jefferson Scomacao from IKEA/PTC endorses Trello.
facts.evidence: Jefferson Scomacao, Development Manager at IKEA/PTC

facts.text: 81% of customers chose Trello for its ease of use.
facts.evidence: 81% of customers chose Trello for its ease of use.

facts.text: 74% of customers say Trello has improved communication.
facts.evidence: 74% of customers say Trello has improved communication with their co-workers and teams.
